name: Dying Planet
description:
This game was made in 48 hours  for Ludum Dare 42, a world wide Game Jam.

https://ldjam.com/

The theme was "Running out of space" so I decided to make a game where you have to escape from a planet due to meteorites. Everytime a meteorite hits the planet it shrinks a little bit. I wish you lots of fun playing it.

.

.

Controls: 
  • move forward/backward with "w" and "s"
  • turn with "a" and "d"
  • collect stuff with "e"
  • open/ close the build-menu by pressing "b"
  • change selected object with "q" and "e"
  • build object by moving the cursor till the object turns blue and then "left clicking"

*you need a lot of room around the blast furnace to be able to place it, (due to a big collider that I had to gave him because of a bug where you would get catapultet in to space by placing the furnace)

.

.
